about.details:
Incorporated in 1998, D P Wires Ltd is a manufacturer and supplier of steel wires, plastic pipes and plastic films. These products are commonly used in industries like oil & gas, power, environment, civil, energy, automobile, infrastructure etc.

D P Wires manufacturing facilities are located at Ratlam, MP for both wires and plastic products.

The plastic products produced by the company are used in Lining of Canals, Landfills, Highway & Road Constructions, Ponds, Tanks, Water Reservoirs, Mining, and Solution Ponds and for corrosion Resistant on Steel tanks etc. The wire products are used in construction, bridges, oil & gas, automobile springs, sleepers of railway track, national highways and state electricity board.

D P Wires is also engaged in power generation through 2 wind farms of 0.80 MW each in village Okha-Madhi and Jodhpur in District Jamnagar.

contactDetails.full_address: D P Wires Limited, 16-18A Industrial Estate, Ratlam 457001

faqs.question: What is the D P Wires IPO?
faqs.answer:
D P Wires IPO is a SME IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹26.88 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on September 21, 2017, and closes on September 26, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in D P Wires IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in D P Wires IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in D P Wires IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in D P Wires IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'D P Wires IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When D P Wires IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The D P Wires IPO opens on September 21, 2017 and closes on September 26, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of D P Wires IPO?
faqs.answer: D P Wires IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for D P Wires IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in D P Wires IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
